characters.name: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek
characters.description: The Broken - A hardened veteran cleric with glowing green eyes. Survived the Smelting ritual, connected to Quori spirit Golos. Wears heavy chain mail, carries a large bag and shield with Ioun's emblem.

characters.name: Pipira Shimmerlock
characters.description: Pip - An ambitious gnome student wizard. Perceptive, eager to learn, fond of experiments and tinkering with mechanical objects.

characters.name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek
characters.description: Pas'Ta - Snow-white skin, blond hair, wears fur clothing. Works for Culdor Academy. Sharp-witted, mysterious, prefers working alone. Uses archery and flail, carries a magical black leather Grimoire.

characters.name: Furnax
characters.description: Pip's companion - Black with dark blue stripes, cold aura. Unruly but well-trained, intelligent, rescued by the academy.

default.notes: Party exploring Gaia. Suspicious of non-Gaian entities. Connected to Culdor Academy. Characters have experienced magical chaos events.
